Class FileManagerController

java.lang.Object
controlador.FileManagerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class FileManagerController extends Object implements ActionListener
Class representing the view of the file manager. This class handles the graphical user interface (GUI) and user interaction.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Roymar Castillo, Deiner Cespedes, Yader Siezar

    • startFilePropertiesWorker

      public void startFilePropertiesWorker(File file, JLabel sizeLabel, JLabel fileCountLabel, JLabel dirCountLabel)
      Starts a new FilePropertiesWorker to calculate the properties of the specified file. If there is an existing worker that is not yet done, it will be cancelled.
      Parameters:
      file - the file whose properties are to be calculated
      sizeLabel - the label to display the size of the file
      fileCountLabel - the label to display the count of files
      dirCountLabel - the label to display the count of directories
